1495180.name: Nosferatu's Butler: Macabre Annotations
1495180.description:
Nosferatu's Butler
This game is in gradual development (Including GAMEPAD performance). We are working to improve it, including in terms of performance. Currently, it is still heavy (the FPS is low. We believe it is due to the fact that all stages of the game are on a single level. We are correcting this). Development in progress.
USE the KEYBOARD to PLAY
The Butler is committed to recording his memories in a diary | illustrated grimoire.
His story is told gradually, revealing its mysteries and terrors.
Joseph Curwen is a mysterious man. He dedicated his life to the occult and now works as a butler for a mysterious doctor ... a very obvious-looking vampire.
Basically, Butler's job is to manage the mansion on Pleasence Street while looking for guinea pigs for his master's experiment.
Here we have a diary: An illustrated book presenting the secrets of the Nosferatu's Butler.
This DLC brings revelations from Nosferatu's Butler.


A link to the Butler documents will appear on the traditional menu screen of the original game.
In this submenu, you will have access to Joseph Curwen's first grimoire.
It's very simple: Enjoy every page of Joseph Curwen's diary.
Use the keyboard and mouse to navigate through the pages illustrated in the book on a table.
You can zoom (using the right mouse button) and change the performance settings of the visual book.
Use backspace to exit the game.
